title: Pull Me from the Deep
description: Fresh off a breakup that has her reeling, Tahliah attempts to escape by heading back to her island home. Prompted by a friend to take up free diving, she throws herself at the ocean’s mercy until a particularly dangerous diving session is interrupted by a creature Tahliah has never seen before.Rather than eat her, the creature helps her reach the shore safely, leaving Tahliah confused and…wanting more?No matter how hard she tries, Tahliah can’t get the creature out of her mind, nor the way every single one of her synapses fired with burning pleasure when it touched her.Did the creature like their encounter too? Can this be what Tahliah needs to re-discover who she is without her ex-girlfriend?There’s only one way to find out.
author: Kristina M. Canales
